@GetMapping("/register") public SseEmitter register(String taskId) { //4ä¸ªå°æ—¶è¶…æ—¶ å¦‚æœä¸è®¾ç½® é»˜è®¤è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ä¸º30ç§’ è®¾ç½®ä¸º0æ°¸ä¸è¿‡æ—¶ final SseEmitter emitter = new SseEmitter(14400_000L); try { listener.addClient(taskId, emitter); } catch (Exception e) { emitter.completeWithError(e); } return emitter; } } åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª SseEmitter å¯¹è±¡å¹¶è®¾ç½®è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´ï¼Œç„¶å return ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¾¿å°±åˆ›å»ºå¥½äº†ä¸€ä¸ª SSE æ¥å£ã€‚é€šå¸¸ä¼šç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†ç±»æ¥ä¿å­˜æ‰€æœ‰åˆ›å»ºçš„ SseEmitter å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿è°ƒç”¨å…¶ send æ–¹æ³•å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ•°æ®ã€‚ @Component @Slf4j public class NotifyListener { private ListMultimap<String, SseEmitter> emitters; @PostConstruct public void init() { emitters = Multimaps.newListMultimap((new LinkedHashMap<String, Collection<SseEmitter>>()), new Supplier<List<SseEmitter>>() { @Override public List<SseEmitter> get() { return new ArrayList<SseEmitter>(); } }); } @EventListener @Async public void handler(NotifyEvent event) throws IOException { String taskId = event.getTaskId(); int Status = event.getStatus(); List<SseEmitter> clients = emitters.get(clientId); if (status == TaskProgressUtil.TaskStatus.END.getStatus() || status == TaskProgressUtil.TaskStatus.ERROR.getStatus()) { notifyClientAndClose(clients, status, taskId); } else { notifyClient(clients, status); } } private void notifyClient(List<SseEmitter> clients, int status) throws IOException { for (SseEmitter client : clients) { client.send(status); } } private void notifyClientAndClose(List<SseEmitter> clients, int status, String taskId) throws IOException { for (SseEmitter client : clients) { client.send(status); client.complete(); } emitters.removeAll(taskId); } public void addClient(String taskId, SseEmitter emitter) { emitters.put(taskId, emitter); } } è¿™æ ·ï¼Œå½“æœåŠ¡ç«¯éœ€è¦å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦ publish ä¸€ä¸ª NotifyEvent äº‹ä»¶å³å¯ã€‚ å‰ç«¯å®ç°ï¼š1.åˆ›å»ºè¯·æ±‚const es = new EventSource(`/sse/register?taskId=${taskId}`); 2.è®¾ç½®äº‹ä»¶å›è°ƒopen äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œé“¾æ¥ä¸€æ—¦åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘ã€‚ es.onopen = function (event) { // ... }; // å¦ä¸€ç§å†™æ³• es.addEventListener('open', function (event) { // ... }, false); message äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ”¶åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘æ¥çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘ã€‚ es.onmessage = function (event) { var data = event.data; // handle message }; // å¦ä¸€ç§å†™æ³• es.addEventListener('message', function (event) { var data = event.data; // handle message }, false); error äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœå‘ç”Ÿé€šä¿¡é”™è¯¯ï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘ã€‚ es.onerror = function (event) { // handle error event }; // å¦ä¸€ç§å†™æ³• es.addEventListener('error', function (event) { // handle error event }, false); ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ addEventListener æ¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶ã€‚ es.addEventListener('myEvent', function (event) { var data = event.data; // handle message }, false); æ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œåç«¯å‘é€æ•°æ®å°±ä¸èƒ½ç®€å•çš„ send æ•°æ®äº†ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯è¦ send ä¸€ä¸ª SseEventBuilder å¯¹è±¡æ¥åŒ…è£…æ•°æ®ã€‚ emitter.send(SseEmitter.event().name("myEvent").data(data)); å½“æ•°æ®æ¨é€æµç¨‹ç»“æŸæ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨ close æ–¹æ³•å…³é—­è¿æ¥ã€‚ es.close(); è¸©å‘å¦‚æœæ˜¯å‰ç«¯å’Œåç«¯è”è°ƒçš„è¯ï¼Œä¸€å®šè¦è®°å¾— node çš„ä»£ç†ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥ä»£ç† SSE è¯·æ±‚åˆ°åç«¯æ¥å£ï¼Œè¡¨ç°å½¢å¼ä¸ºè¯·æ±‚ä¼šä¸€ç›´ pendingï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœåŠ¡ç«¯ complete() ä¹‹åï¼Œä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨æ‰ä¼šä¸€å£æ°”æŠŠå“åº”å›ä¼ åˆ°å‰ç«¯ã€‚ å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ MDNï¼ŒUsing server-sent events é˜®ä¸€å³°çš„åšå®¢ï¼ŒServer-Sent Events æ•™ç¨‹
